sentence.Network_en: As a frequent moviegoer, Iam keeping abreast of the latest development of Hollywood movies.
sentence.Network_cn: 我是电影院里的常客, 通晓好莱坞电影最新动态.

在这两种取向中所探讨的观众（spectator）都不是指那种经验性的看电影的人（moviegoer），后者只是某一类社会观众的一员。更准 …
Slang... ... get down to business 开始工作 moviegoer 影迷 Actually it's that we owe you a lot. 实际上,应该是我们感谢您.

list.abs: some moviegoers abroad are drawn to what they see as an anti-capitalist message in the film's plot .一些海外观众认为该片情节包含一种反资本家的信息，因而被吸引到影院观影。
moviegoers will be surprised to learn that powerful new drugs like Clozapine played no role in Nash's recovery .让电影观众吃惊的是像氯氮平这样有特效的新药对于纳什的康复不起任何作用。
from the moviegoer's point of view , it is easy to forget the nuance of sprocket holes and light-interrupters while watching an absorbing drama .从电影观众的角度来说，在观看一部引人入胜的电影时，很容易忘记影片齿孔间的细微差别和瞬间的光线打断。
movie 贝尔尼, moviegoing 去电影院, moviegoer 电影观众

entry.def: A moviegoer is a person who often goes to the cinema.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who goes to see movies
